title: Cause Célèbre: A Feel Good, Do Good Romance
description:
Gayla Twist: "I will donate every penny I get from the sale of this book to worthy organizations... that are out there in the trenches fighting slavery every day."
After an eighteen-hour delay in the Bangkok airport, Margot Hernandez just wants to get home. And possibly take a shower. She is not prepared to be bumped to first class and have a gorgeous man seated next to her. "Great," she thinks. "Why can’t I sit next to the hot guy when I don’t smell like an armpit?"But Noah Donavon is more than just a handsome face; he’s famous. Like, movie star famous. And he’d like nothing better than to take Margot out for a celebrity-packed night on the town. The only thing stopping them is that she says no.BONUS: Lisa Scott: The Hot Girl's Friend (Flirts! series)
author: Gayla Twist
